text: The teacher is extremely unhelpful and unapproachable.
Classes are dreadfully boring and monotonous.

The teacher shows favoritism and unfair grading.

Feedback on assignments is minimal and unhelpful.

The classroom environment is unwelcoming and negative.
The teacher is often absent or late to class.

The teacher lacks empathy and understanding towards students.

The teacher lacks clarity in explaining concepts.

The teacher does not value student feedback or opinions.

The teacher does not provide constructive criticism on assignments.

The teacher does not offer extra help or support outside of class.

The teacher does not value student input or participation in class.

The teacher's lack of preparation affects the quality of instruction.
